duties_responsibilities.duty: Design aircraft seats and components in compliance with FAA regulations, and customer and OEM requirements using CAD 2D/3D systems (CATIA v5)
Generate 2D drawings based on created 3D models, using standard aerospace drafting practices and in house drafting standards
Make design changes in seat design and components to meet customer expectations and applicable regulations
Participate in design meetings with project engineers, support Purchasing and Production, and interface with outside suppliers in the design process
Participate in telecoms and meetings with overseas based engineers and program management, and assist in creating bills of material for aircraft seat components and assemblies
Create design change notification documents and presentations outlining design direction and/or design issues. Use regulatory knowledge and parts lists with high variant diversity

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Aerospace Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
